abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Canada", "TaxonKey is Rangifer tarandus (Linnaeus, 1758)", "Year 1902-2024" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 57 records from NatureServe Network Species Occurrence Data 2 records from CMNH Mammals 6 records from Palaeobiology - Vertebrate Comparative Osteology Collection - Royal Ontario Museum 3 records from ISM Mammalogy Collection 18 records from New Brunswick Museum - Mammals 3 records from Natural History Museum (London) Collection Specimens 3 records from naturgucker 4 records from RBINS DaRWIN 1 records from Mammal specimens 4 records from RBINS Mammal collection 3 records from NYSM Mammals 3 records from Mammals Specimens 11 records from Palaeobiology - Vertebrate Fossils Collection - Mammalia - Royal Ontario Museum 3 records from Lund University Biological Museum - Zoological collections (MZLU) 32 records from NHMD Mammalogy Collection 1 records from BoBO - Botanic Garden and Botanical Museum Berlin Observations 5 records from Royal Saskatchewan Museum - Mammalogy Collection 1 records from University of Wyoming Museum of Vertebrates (UWYMV) Mammal Collection (Arctos) 111 records from NMNH Extant Specimen Records (USNM, US) 8 records from Macaulay Library Audio and Video Collection 5 records from University of Alberta Museum of Zoology Mammalogy Collection (UAMZ) 109 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 1 records from Vertebrate Zoology Division - Mammalogy, Yale Peabody Museum 18 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Zoology) Mammal Collection 3 records from PSM Vertebrates Collection 1 records from SDNHM Mammology Collection 27 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University 5 records from KUBI Mammalogy Collection 1 records from TTU Mammals Collection 10 records from NHMD Quaternary Zoology Collection 1 records from UCLA Donald R. Dickey Bird and Mammal Collection 1 records from CM Vertebrate Paleontology Collection 157 records from INSDC Sequences 10 records from CRCM Vertebrate Collection 6 records from Mammal collection of National Museum of Nature and Science 2 records from University of Michigan Museum of Zoology, Division of Mammals 3 records from Observation.org, Nature data from around the World 1 records from LACM Vertebrate Collection 1684 records from Canadian Museum of Nature Mammal Collection 30 records from Cowan Tetrapod Collection - Mammals 2 records from MSU Mammalogy, Ornithology and Vertebrate Paleontology Collections 2 records from Bell Museum mammals 33 records from NHMO Mammal collection 1244 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations 155 records from Mammalogy Collection - Royal Ontario Museum 240 records from AMNH Mammal Collections 1 records from University of Victoria - Zooarchaeology Lab Collection
